value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC).

value.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Describe concepts of relational data
value.excerpt: Describe concepts of relational data

value.title: Explore concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Explore concepts of data analytics

value.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Use Azure Active Directory to you secure your internal, external, and customer identities.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based platform for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

value.title: Introduction to Docker containers
value.excerpt: Introduction to Docker containers

value.title: Define identity and access management in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity and access management in Azure Active Directory and why identity is a core component of your organization’s security posture.

value.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
value.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

value.title: Principles of cloud computing and deployment
value.excerpt: Principles of cloud computing and deployment

value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data.   For more information, see:  • Overview of Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/435/01  • Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZpK_lv6HJkQ" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Ingest, prepare & transform using Azure Databricks & Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Today's business managers depend heavily on reliable data integration systems that run complex ETL/ELT workflows (extract, transform/load and load/transform data). Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can iteratively build, debug, deploy, and monitor your data integration workflows

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
value.excerpt: Discover the Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer tool that enables you to add or modify data. Create stored procedures in JavaScript.

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras

value.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure IoT, and describes Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure. This knowledge can help bring IoT to life for your organization and customers.

value.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy Spring Boot microservices to Azure Spring Cloud (ASC).

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
value.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

value.title: Create a language model with Language Understanding
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model.

value.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure
value.excerpt: You have a traditional on-premises infrastructure that you need to connect to resources in Azure. In this module, you learn how to select a connectivity method for your use cases that balances functionality, cost, and security.

value.title: Develop and configure an ASP.NET application that queries an Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Create an Azure SQL database to store data for an application, and create an ASP.NET application to query data from the database.

value.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
value.excerpt: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.
